name: Nature's Way Kids Smart Vita Gummies Immunity 60 Pastilles
chinese_name: Nature's Way 儿童软糖 提高免疫防感冒发烧 富含接骨木浆果 和 维生素C 60片
description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      Kids Smart VitaGummies Cold & Flu Immunity are a great tasting berry flavour pastille (soft gummie).  They contain Elderberry, Zinc, Vitamin C + Honey to help boost immunity to help ward off sniffles.  Vitamin C is an antioxidant involved in a healthy immune function.  Zinc is a mineral important in supporting immune response.  Honey has been shown to have antibacterial properties.  
    
    
      Miscellaneous
      
    
    
      Drug Interactions
      
    
    
      Warnings
      Vitamins can only be of assistance if the dietary intake is inadequate. Not to be used in children under 2 years without medical advice. If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional.
    
    
      Common Uses
      
    
    
      Ingredients
      Honey 50mg, Sambucus Nigra (black elderberry), Fruit juice powder equiv. to fresh juice 15.8mg 500mg Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) 25mg, Zinc (as Zinc Oxide) 1.5mg.
    
    
      Directions
      Children 2-3 years: Give 2 pastilles per day. Children 4+ years: Give 3-4 pastilles per day.Or as advised by your healthcare professional
    
    
      Indications

name: Nature's Way Kids Smart Vita Gummies Vitamin C 60 Gummies
chinese_name: Nature's Way 儿童软糖 维生素 C 60颗
description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      Kids Smart Vita Gummies Vitamin C can help boost Vitamin C and Zinc intake for  immune support, antioxidant, health & wellbeing.   
Vitamin C is:An important antioxidant, which can help protect the body from free radicals.Important for many biological processes.For healthy immune support.
Zinc is:for many biological processes.for normal immune response.for health and well being.
    
    
      Miscellaneous
      
    
    
      Drug Interactions
      
    
    
      Warnings
      Vitamins can only be of assistance if the dietary intake is inadequate. Not to be used in children under 2 years without medical advice. If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional.
    
    
      Common Uses
      A powerful antioxidant, Vitamin C can help protect the body from free radical damage. Enjoy this powerful antioxidant vitamin teamed up with the power of one of the essential minerals, Zinc, which plays an important role in normal immune response. Just two Vita Gummies a day helps boost Vitamin C and Zinc intake…and it all it tastes great, bursting with delicious citrus flavour!
    
    
      Ingredients
      Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) 30mg,Zinc (as Sulphate) 2.5mg
    
    
      Directions
      Children 2+ years Give two pastilles per day. Or as advised by your healthcare professional
    
    
      Indications

name: Nature's Way Kids Smart Vita Gummies Calcium 60 Pastilles
chinese_name: Nature's Way 儿童软糖 富含钙质和维生素 D 帮助骨骼和牙齿生长 60颗
description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      Kids Smart Vita Gummies Calcium+D3 are a great tasting vanilla flavour soft gummie. Vita Gummies Calcium+D3 are an easy and delicious way to help support your child’s daily intake. Calcium is one of the body’s most important minerals and best known to help support bone-building as it helps build strong healthy bones, teeth and muscle. Calcium is important during childhood and adolescence, to help support a growing skeleton. Vitamin D3 is an essential vitamin that enhances calcium absorption from food and is important for a healthy immune system.
    
    
      Miscellaneous
      
    
    
      Drug Interactions
      
    
    
      Warnings
      Vitamins can only be of assistance if the dietary intake is inadequate. Contains sugars. Contains gluten from wheat.  Not to be used in children under 2 years of age without medical advice. Store below 25C. Protect from moisture. Do not use if tamper evident seal is missing or broken.
    
    
      Common Uses
      The benefits of Kids Smart Vita Gummies Calcium + Vitamin D3 include:

Helps support skeletal growth and healthy development.
Helps support healthy bone structure
Helps supports healthy muscle function.
Inadequate diet and reduced sun exposure can contribute to insufficient levels of Vitamin D3. Vitamin D3 is important for:

Enhancing calcium absorption from food
Helping to support healthy immune function.
Development and maintenance of bones and teeth
Support muscle function especially in childhood, adolescence and young adulthood
    
    
      Ingredients
      
    
    
      Directions
      Children 2-8 years Give two pastilles per dayOr as advised by your healthcare professional.Children 9-11 years Give three pastilles per dayVitamins can only be of assistance if the dietary intake is inadequate.Not to be used in children under 2 years without medical advice.
    
    
      Indications

name: Nature's Way Kids Probiotic Balls 50
chinese_name: Nature's Way 益生菌牛奶巧克力球 助消化 50颗
description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      Probiotic Choc Balls for digestive health & wellbeing
    
    
      Miscellaneous
      
    
    
      Drug Interactions
      
    
    
      Warnings
      Contains milk and soy.  May contain traces of tree nuts.
    
    
      Common Uses
      Each Kids Smart Probiotic ChocBall contains 1 billion good bacteria - lactobacillus acidophilus and  bifidobacterium lactis - often found in yoghurt plus inulin, a prebiotic to further enhance the balance in the digestive system.  
    
    
      Ingredients
      Premium Milk Chocolate [sugar, milk solids, cocoa butter, cocoa mass, emulsifiers (soya lecithin,476), flavour], Glazing Agent (904), Inulin (5%) (prebiotic), Lactobacillus Acidophilus, Bifidobacterium Lactis.
    
    
      Directions
      Children 4+ years: 1-2 probiotic choc balls per day
    
    
      Indications
      Delicious and easy way to maintain digestive health

name: Nature's Way Kids Smart Omega-3 Fish Oil Fruity Chewable Burstlets 50
chinese_name: Nature's Way 儿童可咀嚼胶囊 Omega3 + 鱼油 帮助大脑视力成长 提高学习能力 50颗
description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      NATURE’S WAY KIDS SMART FISH OIL is the delicious fruit flavoured chewable burstlet that is packed with Omega-3.  Research shows Omega-3 can help support healthy brain function, learning and behaviour.
    
    
      Miscellaneous
      
    
    
      Drug Interactions
      
    
    
      Warnings
      Store below 25C.  Protect from moisture.  Do not use if tamper evident seal is broken or missing.
    
    
      Common Uses
      Nature's Way Kids Smart Fish Oil is specifically formulated to assist in providing children with essential Omega-3 nutrients DHA and EPA.  This blend of Omega-3 Fish Oil may assist, support and maintain healthy brain function, healthy behaviour, learning, eye health, healthy temperament and healthy nervous system
    
    
      Ingredients
      Each Capsule contains: 
Natural Fish Oil 500mg 
Providing beneficial Omega-3 Marine Triglycerides 180mg as: 
Eicosapentaenoic Acid (EPA) 35mg 
Docosahexaenoic Acid (DHA) 135mg
    
    
      Directions
      Children from 3 years: Take 1-2 soft capsules per day or as recommended by your healthcare professional.  Can be chewed and swallowed.
    
    
      Indications

name: Nature's Way Kids Calcium Strawberry Milkshake Burstlets 50
chinese_name: Nature's Way 儿童可咀嚼胶囊 富含钙质和维生素D 帮助骨骼牙齿生长 50颗
description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      Have you had your three serves of Calcium today?In today's busy world, balancing school and preschool, after-school activities, sport, homework and fun with optimum nutrition can be challenging. Most health authorities recommend Australian children have three serves of calcium-rich foods every day, to reach the recommended daily intake of 800mg per day. But if your child can't have dairy or is lactose-sensitive, doesn't like milk, or won't go near a calcium-rich green leafy vegetable, then ensuring they get enough calcium can be difficult.Now with Nature's Way Kids Calcium there is a fun, delicious and easy way to boost your child's calcium intake!By incorporating Nature's Way Kids Calcium into your child's eating plan, combined with healthy, balanced eating and other calcium-rich foods, you can easily ensure your child is getting the recommended amount of calcium for optimum growth and development!
    
    
      Miscellaneous
      
    
    
      Drug Interactions
      Nature’s Way Kids Calcium is Dairy & Lactose Free
    
    
      Warnings
      Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet.
    
    
      Common Uses
      
    
    
      Ingredients
      Each capsule contains:
Calcium (as calcium hydrogen phosphate anhydrous)	200mg
Cholecalciferol (Vitamin D3 3001U)	7.5mcg Phosphorus (as calcium hydrogen phosphate anhydrous) 154mg
    
    
      Directions
      Children from 3 years: Take 1-2 Nature's Way Kids Calcium 50 Capsules per day.
    
    
      Indications

description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information

      Nature's Way Kids Smart Fish Oil is specifically formulated to assist in providing children with essential Omega-3 nutrients DHA and EPA.  This blend of Omega-3 Fish Oil may assist, support and maintain healthy brain function, healthy behaviour, learning, eye health, healthy temperament and healthy nervous system
    
    
      Ingredients
      Fish Oil Natural - 500mgProviding beneficial OMEGA 3 Marine Triglycerides 180mg as Docosahexaenoic Acid (DHA) - 133mgEicosapentaenoc Acid (EPA) - 28mgNo Artificial colours or flavoursNo Added yeast, wheat, dairy or gluten

Kids Smart capsules use a patent-protected taste masking system to deliver a great-tasting capsulewith all the goodness of Omega-3 Fish Oil. Kids Smart Trio offers 3 different and exciting "non-fishy" flavours in one pack, making it even easier to maximise your child's intake of "brain food" Omega-3 nutrients.

description:
Information

      60 soft pastilles (soft gummies). Raspberry flavour. Each gummie contains: Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) 20mg, Nicotinamide (Vitamin B3) 6mg, Vitamin K 18.75mcg, Cholecalciferol (Vitamin D3 100IU) 2.5mcg, Cyanocobalamin (Vitamin B12) 0.75mcg, Thiamine Nitrate (Vitamin B1) 350mcg , Riboflavin (Vitamin B2) 125mcg, Calcium (as Calcium Phosphate) 5mg, Iodine (as Potassium, Iodide) 22.5mcg , Magnesium (as Magnesium Phosphate) 5mg, Zinc (as Zinc Oxide) 1mg, Spinacia oleracea (Spinach) leaf powder 5mg. Lycopersicon esculentum (Tomato) fruit powder  Equiv to Steroidal alkaloids calculated as solanine 10mcg 5mg, Daucus carota (Carrot) root powder 5mg , Beta vulgaris (Beetroot) root powder 5mg, Cynara scolymus (Artichoke) flower bud powder 5mg.  Contains sugars. Contains gluten from wheat.
    
    
      Directions

      Indications

description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      WHAT IS RESTORE PROBIOTIC FOR KIDS?
Restore for Kids is a delicious fizzy berry tablet that kids will love, and that you will love too, because it contains two well researched types of good bacteria, that help support:

upset tummies
digestive upsets
immunity boost
general health
WHY CHOOSE RESTORE PROBIOTIC FOR KIDS?
Delicious probiotics with a super-berry blast!  Each tablet is packed with the natural flavour burst of Blueberry and Acai superfruits.
WHO ARE RESTORE PROBIOTIC FOR KIDS FOR?
Safe for Children 3+ to support a happy tummy, immunity and general well-being.

Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      Kid's Smart Triple Strength DHA is a delicious orange flavoured chewable burstlet that is packed with Omega-3 DHA. It provides two essential omega-3 fatty Kids Smart DHA 300mg Triple Strength is scientifically formulated to support children’s development. It is high in DHA, an essential nutrient for children that can help support cognitive health and development, maintain a healthy nervous system, and support vision and eye development. DHA can also support children’s general health and their ability to think, learn and remember. acids – docosahexaenoic acid (DHA) and eicosapentaenoic acid (EPA) that our bodies cannot produce, so we need to get them from either the food we eat or quality supplements in order to meet our daily needs. DHA is known to help children’s developing brains and preliminary research has found that Omega-3 DHA may help support healthy brain function, learning and behaviour.
    
    
      Miscellaneous

      Warnings

      Directions
      Children from 12 months: Give 1 soft capsule per day (as shown below),Children from 5 years: Give 2 soft capsules per day. Or as recommended by your healthcare professional. Not recommended for children under 6 months. Product is only to be used under adult supervision. Nature’s Way Kids Smart DHA 300mg has a delicious Orange taste and can be taken in two easy ways:
Twist and Squirt: Simply twist or cut the rail and squeeze into your child’s mouth or onto their favourite food. 
Chew and Burst: place the chewable capsule directly into the mouth and chew. The entire capsule is safe to be eaten.
